kizuna_dragon_a_02:
I have a question for you. Do you find my class
difficult?[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_a_03:
Hmm... Perhaps I need to improve how I convey
the material.[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_a_04: That is certainly good to hear.[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_a_06:
You chose to take on the Gyms as part of your
Treasure Hunt.[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_a_07:
That must mean you like Pokémon battles. Is that
correct?[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_a_08a:
One naturally becomes skilled at doing what they
enjoy. That must be why you are so strong.[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_a_08b:
Then you’re attempting to overcome a weakness?
I applaud your efforts, indeed![npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_a_10:
Ah, do forgive me for springing such an odd
question upon you so suddenly.[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_a_11:
I often find myself pondering the nature of
strength these days...[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_a_12:
[BD06:0]Anyway, thank you again for your input,
[trnm:0]![npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_a_system_01: You became slightly closer with Mr. Hassel!
